arts.ttl: Jens Berthel Askou praises 'fast thinking' Motherwell stars for unlocking Aberdeen
arts.sum: The Steelmen grabbed a point at Pittodrie as they caught out the home defence

Four points separate ninth-placed Aberdeen with Motherwell sat in sixth, heading into this weekend's matches, before the two teams meet at Pittodrie in the Scottish Premiership. Aberdeen secured back...

arts.ttl: Jack Milne warns Motherwell Aberdeen are due them one as he takes harsh Athens lesson to heart
arts.sum: The Euro hero was a standout for the Dons in Larnaca as Jimmy Thelin's side gave themselves a Conference League point to build on

arts.ttl: All 6 Scottish Premiership weekend predictions - Week 12
arts.sum: After last week's Scottish League Cup action, all 12 teams are back in action in the Scottish Premiership this week and Tom Hill has made a prediction for every match.
